title: Feature request: Option to make mRemoteNG close itself after being idle for too long
author: ductnone
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
Having an extra option to set an idle timeout timer to have mRemoteNG close itself.

## Current Behavior
mRemoteNG currently stays open indefinitely until manually closed.
This poses a security concern as the software lets one save access information (IP, Username, Password) to networking infrastructure etc.

## Possible Solution
Design a new option under the security tab that lets you set an idle timeout timer in seconds/minutes.
